CN.content:

2. J SC (Job-related Skills and Competencies) - This is also a material name entity as it is a term used to describe a specific area of skill or competency in the workplace.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" in the given paragraph:

1. EQE (Emotional Quotient Enhancement) - This is a material name entity as it is a term used to describe a specific concept or idea.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are EQE and J SC.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities earlier. Here are the relevant entities that refer to the Value of Material Property in the given paragraph:
